source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_SEQ_00<tab>Behind his impassive mask, you sense that Backrix is eyeing you and your comrades with no small amount of suspicion.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_SEQ_00<tab>ショートストップ野営地の記録屋バックリクスは、冒険者の言動を不審がっている。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_SEQ_01<tab>A plainly exasperated Backrix reiterates that he watched you depart for Midas only moments before your return. Unable to make sense of your version of events, he suggests that you take the matter up with Mide.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_SEQ_01前回までの冒険録：
蛮神アレキサンダーの、第2のコアを停止する作戦は成功した。しかし「青の手」を率いる万能のクイックシンクスは、まるで未来を予見していたかのように、「エニグマ・コーデックス」の最後の断章を奪取。そしてショートストップ野営地に戻った冒険者たちを、奇妙な現象が待ち受けていた……。
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
記録屋バックリクスは、冒険者とミーデの言動が何やらおかしいという。ショートストップ野営地の「ミーデ」と話し、双方の違和感の原因を探ろう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_SEQ_02<tab>You confer with Mide, Biggs, and Wedge, and learn that the goblin standing guard in front of the primal has corroborated Backrix's claims. After exploring several theories, you have no choice but to consider the possibility that something is odd about the passage of time within the barrier around Alexander. At a loss to know how to proceed, Biggs suggests seeking Cid's opinion, and Wedge duly requests his presence via linkpearl. All that remains is to await the arrival of the Ironworks' finest mind.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_SEQ_02<tab>ミーデと話した。魔法障壁の内部で「時間」の変調に遭遇した可能性がある。シドの意見を聞くため、ショートストップ野営地の<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FAD01 /var>で待機しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_SEQ_03<tab>Cid and Y'shtola have scarcely arrived when the ground begins to tremble. Fearing the worst, you rush to gain a better view of Alexander, and Cid witnesses a surprising phenomenon: the flow of aether that had been leaking from the primal reverses, as if time itself had been turned back. For all their combined knowledge, neither Cid nor Y'shtola can offer a credible explanation for this unprecedented event, and they are forced to concede that Alexander may possess a means to manipulate time... Though the implications of this explanation are grim beyond reckoning, none of your companions seem ready to admit defeat just yet. Trouble Wedge for his thoughts on your predicament.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_SEQ_03<tab>シドがヤ・シュトラをともなって現れたちょうどそのとき、アレキサンダーを覆う魔法障壁内で異変が発生した。どうやら障壁内の時間が「巻き戻され」、コア停止という過去が「なかったこと」にされてしまったらしい。蛮神の「コア」を幾度停止しようとも、わずかな動力で復元されてしまう……ゆく手に立ちふさがる未知の脅威に、天才技師シドすらも言葉を失った。このあとすべきことについて、シャーレアン工匠街に残った「ウェッジ」の話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_SEQ_04<tab>Wedge informs you that Cid and Y'shtola have returned to Matoya's Cave, and seems optimistic that their combined intellect will succeed in identifying some means to combat the Illuminati. With that, he and Biggs trudge back to the Shortstop, while Mide indicates that there is something she wishes to discuss with you upon your return.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_SEQ_04<tab>今回いいところナシだったウェッジは挽回を誓い、ビッグスと連れだって引き揚げていった。最後に、ショートストップ野営地の「ミーデ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_SEQ_05<tab>Back at the Shortstop, Mide expresses bitter regret at the part she played in bringing Alexander to life, and reaffirms her determination to rescue Roundrox. Ahead lies a battle against an enemy of unknowable power, but you must endeavor to prepare yourself all the same, for if you fail, all will pay the price of the Illuminati's twisted utopia.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_SEQ_05<tab>ミーデはラウンドロクスを取り戻すまで、彼女の「たからもの」を守るつもりのようだ。「時間」をあやつるという蛮神アレキサンダーの脅威は、まだ計り知れないものの、最後の決戦の日はそう遠くなさそうだ。そのときこそ、アレキサンダーと「青の手」に、大いなる逆襲を果たそう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_TODO_01<tab>Wait for Cid to arrive.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E9FAD01 /var>で待機

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Wedge.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_TODO_02<tab>ウェッジと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Mide at Bigwest Shortstop.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_TODO_03<tab>ミーデと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BACKRIX_000_000<tab>Pssshkoh... Backrix is certain that uplanders left for metal giant only moments before returning. He watches uplanders disappear over horizon with own two eyes!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BACKRIX_000_000シュコォ……シュコォ……
オマエら　ミダースの「コア」潰すため　出ていった。
オレ様見送ったの　ついさっき……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BACKRIX_000_001<tab>But it is <var 1A 02 /var>impossible<var 1A 01 /var> to return so soon if uplander's tale is true! ...Why treasure hunter also makes such claims, Backrix does not know. Go uplander, trade tongueflaps with Mide, and together think of explanation.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BACKRIX_000_001……なのにオマエら　もう戻ってきた！
そういや「ミーデ」も　ヘンなコト言ってた……。
オマエらちょっと　ハナシあってこい！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BIGGS_000_030<tab>What a bunch of bleedin' dolts! Why didn't we just leave the fragment here with Backrix!?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BIGGS_000_030クソッ……迂闊だったぜ！
今にして思えば「エニグマ・コーデックス」の最後のかけらは、
親方に預けとくのが安全だったかもしれん……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BIGGS_000_031<tab>Still, we did do <var 1A 02 /var>one<var 1A 01 /var> thing right, I s'pose. The second core's out of action, and that primal's going nowhere.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BIGGS_000_031お前のおかげで第2の「コア」を潰せたから、
よかったようなものの……。
さもなきゃ、アレキサンダーが完璧に制御されるトコだったぜ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_040<tab>Try as I might, I cannot think of a logical explanation for what happened back there.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_040<tab>クイックシンクスの態度……あれはどういうことッス！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_041<tab>Not only did the platforms malfunction at precisely the right moment, but Quickthinx was on the <var 1A 02 /var>only<var 1A 01 /var> one that didn't. And it just happened to be in <var 1A 02 /var>exactly<var 1A 01 /var> the right place to catch the codex fragment. Do you know how difficult it would be to orchestrate something like that, much less <var 1A 02 /var>predict it<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_041昇降機の緊急停止を「予言」した上に、
あいつだけ、まったく陽動にかからなかったッス！
こうすれば断章が手に入るって、100％確信した動きだったッス。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_050<tab>...Forgive me. Through my incompetence, the Illuminati have all they need to control Alexander. And though the beast is now immobile, I cannot help but feel that matters are worse.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_050ごめんなさい……最後の切札を奪われてしまうなんて。
「コア」の停止に成功していなかったら、どうなっていたか……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_051<tab>Of course, Backrix claims that none of this ever happened. I only wish he were right.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_051……それからひとつ、気になることがあるの。
ここに戻ってから「記録屋バックリクス」と話が噛みあわないのよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_060<tab>Have you been able to make any sense of Backrix's account? According to his version of events, we would scarcely have had time to <var 1A 02 /var>reach<var 1A 01 /var> the core, much less shut it down. But we were all there─we all know what happened.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_060……あなたも、何か変だと思ったのね？
バックリクスの言い分だと、私たちが敵の抵抗を排除して、
ミダースの「コア」を停止させるほどの時間は経っていない……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BIGGS_000_061<tab>Are you sure he's not just confused? Maybe he got lost in all that data of his, and forgot the time.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BIGGS_000_061忘れモノでも取りに戻ったのか、だと？
ヤツの感覚では、そんな短い時間のできごとなのか……！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_062<tab>I'm afraid not. That is, unless the goblin standing watch near Alexander was also confused. His reports corroborate Backrix's. No...something else is going on here, I'm certain of it. The question is, what? If we assume for a moment that the goblins' accounts are true, then hardly any time has passed since we entered the barrier around Alexander.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_062あっ、オイラも出入口の見張りに同じことを聞かれたッス！
変ッス…………まるで、あの魔法障壁の内側に入ってから、
時間がほとんど流れていないみたいッス……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_063<tab>Time...stopped? Impossible...
target: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_063<tab>…………「時間」か。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BIGGS_000_064<tab>Impossible? You mean like Quickthinx predicting exactly what was going to happen in the core room? I hate to say it, but maybe he <var 1A 02 /var>wasn't<var 1A 01 /var> talking out of his arse. If time doesn't work the same in there, maybe he saw the future!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BIGGS_000_064たしかにそうだ……また「時間」にかかわる話だぜ！
ほら、クイックシンクスの野郎も、未来を知ってるような態度で、
コーデックスを奪っていっただろう！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_065<tab>Hmmm... There may be another explanation for that. There is a device deep within Alexander capable of performing complex mathematical calculations. It is not outside the realm of possibility that it could be used to predict the outcome of simple events.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_065アレキサンダーの内部には、
「階差機関」という巨大な演算装置が搭載されているの。
単純な事象なら、予知や予測も可能だと思うけれど……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BIGGS_000_067<tab>Using mathematics to predict the future!? Now even if I <var 1A 02 /var>could<var 1A 01 /var> believe that, it wouldn't explain this business with Backrix!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BIGGS_000_067演算による未来予知か……。
しかし、いま起きている奇妙なできごととは、つながらないぞ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_068<tab>Biggs is right. Perhaps the presence of the primal somehow disrupted the flow of time within the barrier. It's only a theory, of course─and a far-fetched one at that─but it might go some way towards explaining recent events.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_068もしかして……巨大な蛮神が顕現したせいで、
魔法障壁の内部に、時空の歪みが生じてしまったッス？
だとしたら、いろいろ変なことが起きても不思議はないッス。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_069<tab>...To be clear, you are implying that the Illuminati are aware of this temporal disruption, and have been using it to somehow gaze into the future? Very well. If you are willing to accept that, why not go further? Might it not be the case that they have found a way to bend time to their will?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_069……障壁のなかで時間の乱れが生じていて、
敵はその現象を利用して、未来を覗き見た……とか？
いえ、まさか……時間が意図的に「操作」されてるってことは……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_100_069<tab>By moving back and forth in time, the Illuminati could effectively manipulate the present however they saw fit. They would ever remain one step ahead of us, our every effort doomed to fail from the first.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_100_069敵が時計の針を巻き戻したり、進めたりするように、
時間に「干渉」できるとしたら…………？
少し先の未来を知って、私たちを翻弄することだって……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BIGGS_000_070<tab>Now, that's a sobering theory. But it's still only a theory, right? There's no point panicking just yet! Wedge, give the chief a call on your linkpearl, why don't you? If anyone knows how to untangle this knot, it's him.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BIGGS_000_070おい、仮にそうだったら、オレたちの手に負える話じゃないぜ！
……ウェッジ、リンクシェルでシド親方を呼びだしてくれ！
親方なら、解明の糸口ぐらいはつかんでくれそうだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_071<tab>Chief, it's me! It's about Alexander! We've noticed something strange about time inside the primal... What? No, not <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> time inside the primal, <var 1A 02 /var>the<var 1A 01 /var> time─I-I mean time itself! Chief, it might be best if you just came here... Aye, aye─we'll await your arrival.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_071……あっ、親方……こちらウェッジ…………き、緊急事態ッス！
えっと……とにかく……「時間」が大変なんッス……。
…………ち、違うッス……「時間がない」って話じゃないッス～。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BIGGS_000_100<tab>I've heard some strange things in my time, but this might well top the lot. Just thinking about it gives me a sore head. No sense racking our brains over it, though. The chief'll only end up proving us wrong.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BIGGS_000_100「時間」の変調か……何か、妙なことになってきやがったな。
シド親方が、お前たちの考えすぎだって、
笑い飛ばしてくれればいいんだが！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_110<tab>The chief says he's on his way! And I think I heard Y'shtola's voice on the other end as well. She kept asking him what I was talking about.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_110……シド親方が、こっちに向かってるそうッス！
リンクパールの向こうで、ヤ・シュトラさんの声も聞こえたッス。
おふたりが駆けつけるような、一大事じゃなきゃいいッスけど……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_120<tab>It seems like only yesterday that Roundrox and I spent a few happy hours here sorting through her collection of treasures. How did things come to this?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_120ほんの少し前まで、ここでラウンドロクスと、
がらくたがどうとか、他愛のない話をしてたのに……。
どうして、こんなことになってしまったの……？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_CID_000_700<tab>Is that a heated debate, I hear!? Boys! You started without me! Now, what was that you were saying over the linkpearl? Something about running out of time?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_CID_000_700……わざわざ、来てやったぜ！
ウェッジの話がさっぱり要領を得ないんで、
直接、話を聞いたほうが早いと思ってな！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_YSHTOLA_000_701<tab>Cid insisted that I accompany him─though I would have come even had he not. Matters have taken a turn for the worse, I gather.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_YSHTOLA_000_701私からも、行ったほうがいいと口添えしたの。
また、何かが起きそうな……妙な胸騒ぎがするのよ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_CID_100_701<tab>You can say that again!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_CID_100_701<tab>ヤ・シュトラの予感が、的中したようだな！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_YSHTOLA_000_702<tab>The aetheric fluctuations are akin to those I observed shortly before the primal's awakening. In the absence of a functioning core, its form is dissipating, albeit slowly.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_YSHTOLA_000_702漂うエーテルの感触が、再起動の直前にそっくりだわ。
あのときは、そう……ここから急変が起きた……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_CID_000_703<tab>Y'shtola─would you mind lending me your goggles for a moment? It can't hurt to have a second opinion.
target: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_CID_000_703<tab>……ヤ・シュトラ、測定器を。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_CID_000_704<tab>What in the seven hells...!? The aether pouring from the primal is flowing <var 1A 02 /var>backwards<var 1A 01 /var>...as if time were passing in reverse.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_CID_000_704……何だこれは！？
漏れだしたエーテルが、左右の「コア」に戻ってゆく……
まるで、時間の流れが逆転しちまったみたいだぜ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_YSHTOLA_000_705<tab>That cannot be. Such a phenomenon is wholly without precedent. Knowing so little of this primal's capabilities, however, it would be remiss to discount the possibility outright.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_YSHTOLA_000_705そんなまさか……時間を逆流させるなんて……。
いえ……あの蛮神の能力の、すべてが判明していない以上、
可能性は否定できない……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_706<tab>If it is as we fear, then at this very moment, Alexander could be undoing our efforts to shut down its cores. All of our labors will have been for naught.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_706……やはり、悪いほうの推測があたったみたいね。
アレキサンダーによって、あの障壁内の時間が干渉を受け、
「コア」が停止したという事実が「なかったこと」にされつつある。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_YSHTOLA_000_707<tab>Ah, the treasure hunter of whom we have heard so much. You seem unperturbed by our outlandish speculations. Was this perchance the subject of Wedge's communication?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_YSHTOLA_000_707あなたは、)) (( )) 02 /var>の協力者ね？
……「やはり」ということは、
ほかにも「時間」の変調を示す現象に遭遇したのかしら？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_CID_000_708<tab>Gods help us... If there is any truth to this, it won't matter how many cores we disable─the Illuminati will simply undo any damage we cause!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_CID_000_708クソッ……敵を侮ってたぜ！
たとえ蛮神の「コア」が致命傷を受けても……
ヤツらは時計の針を戻すように、白紙に返せるってことだぞ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_709<tab>Then what do we do, Chief? How do we even <var 1A 02 /var>begin<var 1A 01 /var> to fight something like that!?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_709……ず、ずるいッス！
そんなデタラメな蛮神を、いったいどうやって止めるッス！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_710<tab>To erase the past... To return to a clean slate. Could Dayan have known...?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_710流れた時を、白紙に……。
「彼」にそんな機能が……？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_ILLUMINATIELITEGUARDB02253_000_720<tab>Pssshkoh... Preparations for restoration of <var 1A 02 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 01 /var> are complete! Calculations show margin of error for futurereadings is 0.03 percent!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_ILLUMINATIELITEGUARDB02253_000_720シュコォ……シュコォ……
「エニグマ・コーデックス」復元　成功確実！
階差機関によると　予測誤差　プラスマイナス0.03％……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_721<tab>Pshhhkohhh... Foolish gobbie. When future is decided, there is no error.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_721コフォ……コフォ……
違うな……その事象は……「定められし未来」のひとつ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_100_721<tab>There is no failure!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_100_721<tab>失敗の確率は……ゼロだ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_722<tab>Listen well, chosen of Illuminati!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_722<tab>聞け……選良の民よ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_100_722<tab>At last, all pieces are in place! No longer must wise suffer foolishness of unwise!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_100_722最後のパーツは……我が手に落ちた！
敗北も雌伏も……すべてこのために……必要な過程だった！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_723<tab>Time is come to backstrike! Inferiors will make way for perfect world...or <var 1A 02 /var>die<var 1A 01 /var>. Now...restore <var 1A 02 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_723だがこの瞬間より……我らの反撃が始まる！
開始せよ…………「エニグマ・コーデックス」の復元を！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_724<tab>Pshhhkohhh... Now is Alexander Illuminati's to control! Soon will cores disabled by uplanders be disabled no longer.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_724コフォ……コフォ……
いま……アレキサンダーは……我らの制御下に置かれた！
ただちに左右の「コア」停止前の状態へ…………

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_100_724<tab>Reverse time!
target: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_100_724<tab>「時」を巻き戻す！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_725<tab>Once power flows to third core, Alexander will be fully operational! And with third core will its true potential awaken!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_725残るは第3の「コア」を動力で満たし……完全起動を果たすのみ！
そのとき時空干渉に留まらぬ……最終機能が覚醒する。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_100_725<tab>Wings of time will unfurl, and all of history will be at mercy of Illuminati! Chosen ones will amend mistakes of past and reshape world into perfection!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_100_725アレキサンダーの「最終機能」……
それは時空を自在に移動し……誤った歴史を修正するための……
…………「時の翼」！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_726<tab>Pshhhkohhh... At last, prophecies of <var 1A 02 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 01 /var> will be fulfilled.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_726コフォ……コフォ……
かくて「エニグマ・コーデックス」の予言は……成就する……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_727<tab>And Quickthinx Allthoughts will rule as king of new world─of <var 1A 02 /var>correct<var 1A 01 /var> world! Chosen ones, menders of history...be proud to serve as builders of this paradise!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_QUICKTHINXALLTHOUGHTS_000_727我は理想世界の王！
「定められし未来」より降り立ちて……正しき歴史を導く者！
我が「理想」の礎となることを…………汝が歓びとなせ！！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_750<tab>We don't have the luxury of time to plan our next step. We must rescue Roundrox without delay─for her sake and ours.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_750私たちには、時間がない……。
ラウンドロクスを、一刻も早く助けなければいけないのに。
よりによって、その「時間」があやつられているなんて……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BIGGS_000_760<tab>Seems we have more questions than answers where this primal's concerned... If the Illuminati really can see into the future, does that mean they already know what we're going to do next?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BIGGS_000_760蛮神の機能が未知数っていうのが、不気味だな……。
もし、敵が未来を予知できるなら……その対策も予知されるのか？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BACKRIX_000_770<tab>Pssshkoh... A primal that bends time!? Impossible!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BACKRIX_000_770シュコォ……シュコォ……
まさかのまさか　蛮神　時間あやつってた！？

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BACKRIX_000_771<tab>This data must be recorded at once!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_BACKRIX_000_771このデキゴト　オレ様自慢の　データレコードに
バッチリ　記録しておく！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_800<tab>Y'shtola and the chief have returned to Matoya's Cave. Don't worry, between them, they're sure to find the answer to our problems. If it isn't waiting on a shelf in the Sharlayan annals, it'll be in some forgotten corner of the chief's brain, you mark my words!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_800親方とヤ・シュトラさんは、また戻っていったッス！
シャーレアンの記録をあたったり、新しい技術を試したりして、
「青の手」を出し抜く方法を考えるそうッス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_801<tab>And the next time we meet Quickthinx, we'll be ready for him!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_WEDGE_000_801オイラは今回、まったくいいとこナシだったッスけど……
次はがんばって、クイックシンクスの野郎を、
ギャフンと言わせてやるッス！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_802<tab>Adventurer─there is something I would like to discuss with you. But mayhap it would be best to wait until we are safely back at the Shortstop. I will see you there.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_802……冒険者さん。
野営地に戻って、少しお話しましょう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_820<tab>I suppose I should start by apologizing. For everything. Were it not for me, the Illuminati would never have summoned that infernal machine...or gained the means to control it.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_820ごめんなさい……クイックシンクスに、完全に出し抜かれた……。
まさか「彼」に、時間をあやつる機能があるなんて。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_821<tab>And now Quickthinx possesses the power to manipulate time. To foresee the future and erase the past.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_821でも実際に「過去」の事象が「なかったこと」にされ、
原理は不明だけど、「未来」をも予知されてしまった……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_822<tab>I dare not think how he will use it. Returning the cores to their former state was but a foretaste. When all three are active, and Alexander can traverse both time and space, nothing will stand between the Illuminati and their twisted utopia...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_822排他的な思想をかざして、みずから敵を作り、
ますます歪んだ選良主義を強めてゆく……それが「青の手」よ。
そんな危険な集団に、すべてのパーツが渡ってしまったなんて！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_823<tab>...We cannot let it come to that, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Somehow, we must find a way to stop them.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_823敵は労せずして、ふたつの「コア」を復元してしまったわ。
アレキサンダーの第3の「コア」が復活したとき、
いったい、どれだけの異変が引き起こされるのか……！

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_824<tab>But first, we must rescue Roundrox. Of all the innocent victims of this sorry tale, her plight pains me the most.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_824でも……私がいちばん心配なのは、ラウンドロクスの状態よ。
何とかして、あの娘を救う方法を考えましょう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_825<tab><sigh> ...The Shortstop just isn't the same without her. I hope someone will keep her treasures safe until she returns...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNR205_02253_MIDE_000_825あの娘がいない野営地が、こんなに寂しいなんて。
ラウンドロクスが戻ってくるまで、誰かが大切な「たからもの」を、
守ってあげなくちゃね……。
